load the data 
```{r}
data<- read.csv("Data/POC_ID_RA_list.csv", sep=";", header = TRUE, na.strings = "NA")
colnames(data)
class(data)
str(data)

range(data$Recruit_size_cm2)
range(na.omit(data$Recruit_size_cm2))

#calculate the diameter assuming the shape is a circle
data$Recruit_diameter_cm <- 2*(sqrt(pi/data$Recruit_size_cm2))
```

Size Class definitions
```{r}
#Class 1 0 - 1cm in diameter = 0- 0.7854 cm2
#Class 2 >1 - 4cm in diameter = >0.7854- 0.7854 cm2
#Class 1 0 - 1cm in diameter = 0- 0.7854 cm2
#Class 1 0 - 1cm in diameter = 0- 0.7854 cm2

#set the size class diameter
c1 <- 1
c2 <- 4
c3 <- 6
c4 <- 10

#Class 1 0 - 1cm in diameter = 0- 0.7854 cm2
c1A <- pi*(c1/2)^2

#Class 1 0 - 1cm in diameter = 0- 0.7854 cm2
c2A <- pi*(c2/2)^2

#Class 1 0 - 1cm in diameter = 0- 0.7854 cm2
c3A <- pi*(c3/2)^2

#Class 1 0 - 1cm in diameter = 0- 0.7854 cm2
c4A <- pi*(c4/2)^2

```
